question: How many teams participated in the 2019 Cricket World Cup?
explanation: Total 10 teams participated in the 2019 Cricket World Cup. The 2019 ICC Cricket World Cup was the 12th Cricket World Cup, organised by the International Cricket Council (ICC). It was hosted between 30 May to 14 July in England and Wales. The teams participated are England, New Zealand, Australia, India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, South Africa, Bangladesh, West Indies, Afghanistan.
